channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 17:32 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 17:32 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 17:29 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
